com.hazelcast.spi.impl.servicemanager

Interface ServiceManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceManagerImpl

    public interface ServiceManager
    Responsible for managing services.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T getService(String serviceName)
      Gets a Service by serviceName.

      Gets the ServiceInfo for a service by serviceName.

    • Method Detail

      • getServiceInfo

        ServiceInfo getServiceInfo(String serviceName)
        Gets the ServiceInfo for a service by serviceName.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service.
        Returns:
        the found ServiceInfo or null if nothing is found.

      • getServiceInfos

        List<ServiceInfo> getServiceInfos(Class serviceClass)
        Gets all the service info's for services that implement a given class/interface.
        Parameters:
        serviceClass - the class/interface the service should implement.
        Returns:
        a List of the found ServiceInfo. List will be empty if nothing is found.

      • getService

        <T> T getService(String serviceName)
        Gets a Service by serviceName.
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service.
        Returns:
        the found service or null if nothing is found.

      • getServices

        <S> List<S> getServices(Class<S> serviceClass)
        Gets all services implementing a certain class/interface. CoreServices will be placed at the beginning of the list.
        Type Parameters:
        S -
        Parameters:
        serviceClass - the class/interface to check for.
        Returns:
        the found services.

      • getSharedService

        <T extends SharedService> T getSharedService(String serviceName)
        Gets a SharedService by serviceName.
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the SharedService.
        Returns:
        the found SharedService or null if not found.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if a service with the name is found, but isn't a SharedService.
